thread.title: Facebook Tunes Into Television’s Market
thread.title_full: Facebook Tunes Into Television’s Market - WSJ

author: Deepa Seetharaman
title: Facebook Tunes Into Television’s Market

organizations.name: facebook tunes into television’s market facebook inc.

text:
Facebook Inc. might be coming to a bigger small screen.
The social network is developing a video-centric app for television set-top boxes, including Apple Inc.’s Apple TV, people familiar with the matter said, giving it a home for video content—as well as a new vehicle for video advertising.

The app is one of several Facebook projects... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
